exit_criteria: identifies self via form fill or demo request

key_actions: nurture sequences, behavioral scoring, content delivery
exit_criteria: reaches score threshold or triggers intent signal

key_actions: sales outreach, discovery call, needs qualification
exit_criteria: confirmed budget, authority, need, and timeline

key_actions: solution presentation, stakeholder mapping, value demonstration
exit_criteria: stakeholder buy-in and technical validation complete

key_actions: loss reason capture, feedback loop, nurture re-entry
exit_criteria: loss reason documented and post-mortem complete
